code: /* eslint-disable import/no-anonymous-default-export */import axios from'axios';var baseUrl='/api/notes';var getAll=function getAll(){var request=axios.get(baseUrl);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var create=function create(newObject){return axios.post(baseUrl,newObject).then(function(res){return res.data;});};var update=function update(id,newObject){return axios.put("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id),newObject).then(function(res){return res.data;});};export default{getAll:getAll,create:create,update:update};
